summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, discussing a volunteer opportunity to assist with the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. An FBI agent from the C-20 squad seeks assistance with evidence preparation, organization, and review for discovery.

persons.name: SA M
persons.context: Appears to be the primary FBI agent in New York handling the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, seeking volunteer assistance for evidence preparation and review.

connections.description: Both are FBI agents involved in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, with SA M leading the request for assistance and SA being a point of contact.

events.title: Volunteer Solicitation for Epstein/Maxwell Investigation
events.description: Internal FBI emails are exchanged to solicit volunteer assistance from other agents for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, specifically for evidence preparation and review tasks.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking internal volunteer assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
The assistance needed included preparing and organizing evidence for discovery, reviewing items, and listening to recordings.
The investigation was being handled by the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad and the C-20 (VCAC/HT) squad.
The email indicates the investigation was still ongoing and considered a high-profile case at that time.
